titles.title: Appointing and authorizing managers for the impeachment of Samuel B. Kent, a judge of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Texas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: 6/19/2009--Passed House without amendment. Appoints managers for the trial of the impeachment of Samuel B. Kent, a judge of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Texas.
